Name: Roman Cathedral
Description: Give roman cathedrals at the beginning of the game

Name: Roman Cathedral burning
Description: Some Roman Cathedral disapeared with building. This is one reason of building gothic cathedral

Name: Relic hunting
Description: Search a relic to build a Cathedral

Name: Dynastic relic
Description: Create a relic form an ancestor who is a Saint

Name: Monument ambition
Description: Megalomaniac ambition to build a monument

Name: Start Cathedral
Description: Start the building of a Cathedral.
Prerequisites: Plans. Roman Cathedral burning.  Relic hunting. Dynastic relic
Difficulties: Manage the IA case : only richer can do it

Name: Loans
Description: Loan money to fund the Cathedral

Name: Imaginative funding
Description: People find imaginative way to finance the Cathedral

Name: Funding
Description: Funding is irregular. If we can pay, we can loan (only once). Else the building is stopped

Name: Steps
Description: The building is splitted in steps

Name: Buildings
Description: The building progression is tagged by building steps
Difficulties: The buildings must be adapted to the Sacre

Name: Builders
Description: Builders travel accros the Europe to build Cathedrals

Name: Artists
Description: Artists decorate the Cathedrals

Name: Skills
Description: Builders have skills to succeed/fail the building and to build bigger
Difficulties: How to integrate in the system?

Name: Plans
Description: Builders submit plans of the building
Difficulties: How to integrate in the system?

Name: Big Cathedral
Description: Megalomaniac want to have the bigger Cathedral
Difficulties: How to integrate in the system?

Name: Cathedral collapse
Description: Some parts of the Cathedral can be collapsed
Difficulties: Research the part of Cathedral which can be destroyed

Name: Building course
Description: Course to be the first to build a Cathedral

Name: Manœuvre
Description: The manœuvre are the no skill workers. Have workers can do conflicts with local barons

Name: Ecclesiastical visit
Description: Some ecclesiastics want to visit the building of the Cathedral

Name: Resources
Description: Some resources are necessary for some steps of the building

Name: Rivality
Description: The building of the Cathedral can create some rivality

Name: Pictures
Description: Pictures for the events, decisions, …

Name: After
Description: The Cathedral must be stay in live after it is build
